channel.title: Android on Accessibility → Up to 11!
channel.description: Recent content in Android on Accessibility → Up to 11!

item.title: Best practices for building accessible mobile apps
item.description: Title: Best practices for building accessible mobile apps Increment Magazine - Issue 18, about all things mobile, is out now! And I’m really honoured they’ve let me be part of it! Please check out my article: “Best practices for building accessible mobile apps”. I’d love to hear what you think! I hope you like it! Description: An overview of the mindset, strategies, and tools that will help you create apps that truly work for everyone.
